title: Clash Banner?
body:
Did anyone get the clash banner for winning the bracket in the beta test tonight? We won but only got 400 VP, is that what was meant to happen?

Other than that small confusion, hats off to riot for creating Clash, my team and I had a blast and everything ran rather smoothly for us.

Cheers

replies.body:
Also, we all received the summoner Icon, but no trophy for winning the bracket. Were we meant to get one?

Did anyone have this problem?
